short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color picker extension. copy or clear them with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab colors from web pages, color picker, color history. Compared to Color picker, color pick, eyedropper, colorzilla this better. Now you can easily pick any  from any website with our new extension. Color Picker tool will get color palette from any webpage you need. It's a pretty useful tool for web developers or web designers. This extension is pretty simple to use and it has simple and user-friendly interface. We provide you and amazing and useful Color Picker tool so you can get HEX colors from any webpage.
